title: About Me
bio: I am a Data Analytics and AI professional with over 3+ years of hands-on experience delivering business intelligence, predictive analytics, and machine learning solutions across Healthcare, Logistics, and Technology domains. My expertise covers the full data lifecycle â€” from data extraction, cleaning, and transformation to building, optimizing, and deploying advanced analytics models at scale.

I specialize in SQL, Power BI, Python, NLP, and modern cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), enabling organizations to convert complex datasets into actionable insights. With a strong academic foundation in Data Analytics from Northeastern University and a proven track record in industry projects, I have successfully implemented AI-driven solutions that enhanced operational efficiency, automated workflows, and improved decision-making for diverse stakeholders.
